title: Beryl Benacerraf, 73, Dies; Pioneered the Use of Prenatal Ultrasound
description: A radiologist with an uncanny visual sense, she revolutionized the diagnosis of fetal abnormalities like Down syndrome.
dc:creator: Ed Shanahan
media:description: Dr. Beryl Benacerraf in an undated photo. She struggled with reading because of dyslexia, but she was in her element with images.
